attributes.action: consider the banning of insecure websites such as www.chatroulette.com, which can be potentially harmful to its visitors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
www.chatroulette.com is a website that anyone can access. You do not need to register, and you are instantly connected to "random strangers" (their words) who then become your "partner".  As there is no registration there is no way of preventing minors from accessing the website.  Whilst you can 'report' indecent content, users cannot get banned as they do not register.

Users are connected not just by instant messaging, but are also encouraged to use webcams and microphones.

This website is dangerous, and can and will be used for far worse things than innocent chatting.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
